techmeme.title: Sources: Shein's 2024 sales rose 19% YoY to $38B, below the forecast made in 2023; some investors push Shein to cut its valuation from $66B to ~$30B for an IPO (Financial Times)
Sources: Apple aims to eventually meld the modem into the main processor on its devices but likely no sooner than 2028; the M4 MacBook Air may launch in March (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Some US school districts are adopting Sonny, an AI "wellbeing companion," to provide mental health support to students when there aren't enough counselors (Julie Jargon/Wall Street Journal)
A look at India's Svamitva Scheme, which has digitally mapped out landholdings using drones in 300K+ villages as of January 2025, as concerns mount over errors (Scroll.in)
A deep look at "the Zizians", a cult-like group of young tech people exiled from Silicon Valley's rationalist community and allegedly linked to a killing spree (Evan Ratliff/Wired)
